original: Imesaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharāmi.

original: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi.
analyzed: sace ipi me cavati idappaccayā me cavati iti pajānāmi

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ iti ce me āvuso hoti appamāṇaḥ iti me hoti su samāraddhaḥ iti me hoti

original: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi.
analyzed: sace ipi me cavati idappaccayā me cavati iti pajānāmi

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso raññaḥ vā rāja mahāmattassa vā nānā rattānam dussānam dussa karaṇḍakaḥ pūraḥ assa

original: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupeyya.
analyzed: saḥ yaññat eva dussa yugam ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayam pārupitu tam tat eva dussa yugam pubbaṇhasamayam pārupeyya
yaññat eva dussayugam ākaṅkheyya majjhanhika samayam pe

original: sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupeyya.
analyzed: sāyanha samayam tam tat eva dussayugam sāyanha samayam pārupeyya

original: Evameva khvāhaṁ, āvuso, imesaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharāmi.
analyzed: evam eva khvā āha āvuso imesam sattannam bojjhaṅgānam yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayam viharāmi
yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhanhika samayam pe

original: sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena sāyanhasamayaṁ viharāmi.

original: Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti.

original: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi …pe…

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti.

original: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi”.
analyzed: sace ipi me cavati idappaccayā me cavati iti pajānāmi

original: Kathaṁ satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me hotīti bojjhaṅgo?

iti ce me iti

original: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato yāvatā acci tāvatā vaṇṇo, yāvatā vaṇṇo tāvatā acci.

iti ce me iti

original: Kathaṁ appamāṇo iti ce me hotīti bojjhaṅgo?
analyzed: katham appamāṇaḥ iti ce me hoti iti bojjhaṅgo

original: Pamāṇabaddhā kilesā, sabbe ca pariyuṭṭhānā, ye ca saṅkhārā ponobhavikā appamāṇo nirodho acalaṭṭhena asaṅkhataṭṭhena.
analyzed: pamāṇa baddhā kilesā sabbe ca pariyuṭṭhānā ye ca saṅkhārā ponobhavikā appamāṇaḥ nirodhaḥ acala ṭṭhena asaṅkhata ṭṭhena

iti ce me iti

original: Visamā kilesā, sabbe ca pariyuṭṭhānā, ye ca saṅkhārā ponobhavikā, samadhammo nirodho santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena.
analyzed: visamā kilesā sabbe ca pariyuṭṭhānā ye ca saṅkhārā ponobhavikā sama dhammaḥ nirodho santa ṭṭhena paṇīta ṭṭhena

original: Yāvatā nirodhūpaṭṭhāti tāvatā susamāraddho iti ce me hotīti bojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: yāvatā tāvatā su samāraddhaḥ iti ce me hoti iti bojjhaṅgo
